title: France panorama. [No. 70/34]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The European track and field cup - French athletes star at the semi-finals in Zurich. 2. Ballets-on-the-sea - music, the dance, and fireworks with the Marseille Opera Ballet Troupe, in the port of Beaulieu-sur-Mer. 3. Sculptures by your home - modern sculpture for the housing developments of tomorrow. 4. The Paris Metro is 70 years old - the Paris subway system, today and tomorrow. 5. Vacation trails - new guidebooks full of new ideas for holidays.
